uartsci_edma.c File Reference

The file implements the UART driver EDMA Interface functionality which is available only for the C674 i.e. the DSS. More...

Detailed Description

The file implements the UART driver EDMA Interface functionality which is available only for the C674 i.e. the DSS.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct UartSci_DriverEDMA_t UartSci_DriverEDMA

SCI Driver EDMA Block.

The structure is used to hold all the pertinent information with respect to the UART DMA.
